title: Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, 61 Keys Compact Mechanical Keyboard w/White and Grey Color Keycaps, Linear Red Switch, Pro Driver/Software Supported
descriptions:
Introducing the Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard! 

This keyboard is a must-have for FPS Gamers who are looking for a compact yet powerful gaming keyboard. With its 60% layout, you'll have more space on your desk for your gaming setup. 

The Redragon K617 Fizz features a wired connectivity for a reliable and lag-free gaming experience. With 61 keys, you'll have all the essential keys you need for gaming, without any unnecessary clutter. The keycaps come in stylish White and Grey colors, adding a touch of elegance to your gaming rig.

Equipped with Linear Red switches, this keyboard offers a smooth and responsive typing experience. The switches are hot-swappable and have a lifespan of 50 million keypresses, ensuring durability and longevity. Plus, they are quiet mechanical switches, allowing you to game without disturbing others.

The RGB lighting on the Redragon K617 Fizz is truly impressive. With 20 preset lighting effects, you can customize your keyboard to match your gaming style. The brightness and speed of the lighting effects are adjustable, giving you full control over your gaming ambiance. 

This keyboard also comes with software support, including pro driver software for advanced customization. You can personalize your keyboard with custom macros, keybindings, and shortcuts. The software link is available at redragonshop.

In addition to its gaming features, the Redragon K617 Fizz offers dedicated optimizations for FPS Gamers. The compact design saves space on your desk, allowing for efficient workspace management. It even includes a dedicated mouse space for optimized gaming performance.

Experience gaming like never before with the Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard. Upgrade your gaming setup today!
